name: Concrete Polishing Inc
overview: Concrete Polishing Inc, is the leading provider of mirror process finishing for concrete floors. We service commercial and industrial clients nationwide. Our company will create a perfect floor for your business. A floor that will last your business virtually a lifetime. A polished concrete floor does more than just look spectacular; it provides high traction, safety and durability. Hire our company now to transform your ordinary concrete floor into a beautiful, glossy and easy-to-clean surface that keeps your facility looking at its best. Call us now toll free 863-325-5055 to schedule service. Visit our site to read more about our process and schedule service using an online form.
